name: Pokémon Dark
description:
I wanted to explore a possible critical game design option within the world of Pokémon and came up with the idea for Pokémon Dark. One playthrough takes around 10-ish minutes. This game has two slightly different endings (hint: catch/don’t catch).

Massive thanks to the Pokémon Essentials team for their resource kit and Thundaga for his helpful tutorials which enabled me to quickly get up to speed with RPG Maker XP.

I hope you enjoy this rather unusual start to a Pokémon adventure.
